name: post 1
heading: A-230, Fan not Working
body: Fan makes too much noise. It's shaft is shaking too much. Stops in the middle of night. Chances of Falling.

name: post 2
heading: B-231, Flush not Working
body: Water Leakage all day from flush

name: post 3
heading: B-440, Tubelight not working.
body: Tubelight black from sides. Out of date.

name: post 4
heading: A-730, Leakage from fire hose
body: Fire hose has been damaged. Water water everywhere.

name: post 5
heading: A-101, LAN not Working
body: Wire has broken from inside. Sparks are coming out.

name: post 6
heading: B-224, Broken tables
body: I sat on the table and its legs fall apart. New table needed

name: post 7
heading: A-310, Fan not Working
body: Fan makes too much noise. It's shaft is shaking too much. Stops in the middle of night. Chances of Falling.
